courseInfo:
Puppet Language Basics

Learn the principles and syntax of the Puppet language so you can put your Puppet knowledge into action. Quick, focused lessons give you practice writing and editing Puppet code to solve a real-world problem.

After taking this course, you will be able to:
  • Understand the anatomy of a Puppet resource and how it applies to any Puppet code
  • Use correct Puppet syntax to allow your Puppet code to scale from simple to complex infrastructures
  • Understand and use basic Puppet syntax types and features
  • Find and use relevant Puppet resources to write code for your projects
name: Introduction to Puppet Syntax
